verses.text: PEA na‘e lau‘i ‘a Mōsese ‘e Meliame mo ‘Ēlone koe‘uhi ko e fefine Kusa kuo ne mali: he kuo ne mali mo ha fefine Kusa.
Pea na pehē, He ko Mōsese pē kuo folofola ki ai ‘a Sihova? ‘Ikai kuo ne folofola foki ‘iate kitaua? Pea na‘e ongo‘i ‘e Sihova.
(Pea ko e tangata ko Mōsese na‘e anga kātaki ‘aupito, ‘o hulu atu ‘i he tangata kotoa na‘e ‘i he funga kelekele.)
Pea folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki fakafokifā kia Mōsese mo ‘Ēlone mo Meliame, Hū kitu‘a kimoutolu toko tolu, ‘o omi ki he Tēniti Fe‘iloaki‘anga. Pea nau hū kitu‘a ‘a e toko tolu.
Pea hā‘ele hifo ‘a Sihova ‘i he Pou-‘ao, ‘o ne tu‘u ‘i he mata Tēniti, ‘o ne ui ‘a ‘Ēlone mo Meliame: pea na tutu‘u mai kinaua.
Pea ne folofola ange, Tokanga mai ki he‘eku lea: ka ai ha palōfita ‘iate kimoutolu, ko au Sihova te u faka‘ilo au kiate ia ‘i ha vīsone, te u lea kiate ia ‘i ha misi.
Taha kehe ‘eku sevāniti ko Mōsese: ko e falala‘anga ia ‘i hoku fale kotoa.

Ko ‘ema alea mo ia ‘e fai ko e ngutu ki he ngutu, pea ‘i he lea tonu, ‘o ‘ikai ‘i he fakatātā; pea ko e anga totonu ‘o Sihova te ne māta‘i: pea lau ‘e au te mou manavahē ke lau‘i ‘eku sevāniti ko Mōsese.
Pea kakaha ‘a e tuputāmaki ‘o e ‘Eiki kiate kinaua, ‘o ne hā‘ele atu, pea hiki ‘a e ‘Ao mei he Tēniti, pea tā kuo kilia ‘a Meliame ‘o hangē ko e sinou.
Pea hanga ‘e ‘Ēlone kia Meliame, pea tā kuo kilia.
Pea lea ‘a ‘Ēlone kia Mōsese, ‘Oiauē, Tangata‘eiki, ‘oua ā te ke hili ‘a e hia ni kiate kimaua; hono kuo mau fai vale, pea kuo mau hia.
‘Oua ā te ne hangē ha taha mate, ‘a ia kuo ‘osi hono vaeua ‘o hono kakano ‘i he‘ene hū mai mei he manava ‘o ‘ene fa‘ē.
Pea tangi ‘a Mōsese kia Sihova, ‘o pehē, ‘Otua ē, faito‘o mu‘a kiate ia.

Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, Pea ka ne ki‘i ‘anuhi hono mata ‘e he‘ene tamai, ‘ikai kuo ne mā ai ‘o ‘aho fitu? ke tāpuni mu‘a ‘a e fefine ‘i he tu‘a ‘apitanga ‘o ‘aho fitu, pea hili ia pea toe ‘omi.
Pea na‘e tāpuni ‘a Meliame ‘i he tu‘a ‘apitanga ‘o ‘aho fitu: pea na‘e ‘ikai ke toe fononga ‘a e kakai kae‘oua ke fakahū mai ‘a Meliame.
Pea hili ia na‘e hiki ‘a e kakai mei Heseloti, ‘o nau fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i he Toafa ‘o Pēlana.
